css: .cover-live-webinar-anmeldung-section { padding: 6rem 0; background: #f3f4f6; } .container { max-width: 1100px; margin: 0 auto; display: grid; grid-template-columns: 1fr; gap: 3rem; align-items: center; } @media(min-width: 768px) { .container { grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr; } } h1 { font-size: clamp(2.5rem, 5vw, 3.5rem); margin-bottom: 1rem; } .content p { margin-bottom: 2rem; } .webinar-form { display: flex; gap: 1rem; } .webinar-form input { flex-grow: 1; padding: 0.8rem 1rem; border: 1px solid #d1d5db; border-radius: 0.5rem; } .btn-primary { padding: 0.8rem 2rem; background-color: var(--color-primary); color: var(--color-light); border: none; border-radius: 0.5rem; cursor: pointer; } .image img { width: 100%; border-radius: 1rem; box-shadow: 0 10px 30px rgba(0,0,0,0.1); }
